span.span: Provides a base class for all ASP.NET mobile control classes.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为所有 ASP.NET 移动控件的基类类主要包含所有控件共有的样式和上下文信息。As the base class for all ASP.NET mobile controls, the class primarily contains style and context information common to all controls. 有关样式和上下文信息的详细信息，请参阅和类。For more information about style and context information, see the and classes. > [!NOTE] > 因为此类派生自 ASP.NET基类，所有基类属性、 方法和事件均位于每个移动控件。Because this class derives from the ASP.NET base class, all base class properties, methods, and events are available in each of the mobile controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当窗体包含激活而无需从服务器交互的另一种形式的导航元素时，它被视为链接的窗体。When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interaction from the server, it is considered a linked form. 要考虑的窗体的多个条件链接。There are several criteria for a form to be considered linked. 例如，如果满足以下三种情况，B 窗体被视为要链接到窗体：For example, if the following three conditions are met, Form B is considered to be linked to Form A: - 窗体包含目标为 B 窗体Form A contains a with its destination as Form B. - 窗体的不包含事件处理程序。Form A does not contain an event handler. - 窗体 B 未包含任何事件处理程序。Form B has no event handler. 基实现不执行任何操作，但其他控件，如，重写的默认实现。The base implementation does nothing, but other controls, such as the , override the default implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他属性，不同不从其父文件夹继承属性。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果你设置青色父控件，子控件的属性将不会继承青色背景色; 您必须显式设置子控件的到青色，或者让你的属性必须设置属性控件的父级，并将样式表应用于子控件。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 这是与级联样式表的行为一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移动控件，如，可以重写此方法以确定它是否为用于提交窗体控件。Mobile controls, such as the , can override this method to determine whether this is a control used for form submission. 其他控件可以通过提供逻辑来以编程方式确定它们是否必须是扩展`submit`控制，例如，通过检查特定的属性。Other controls can be extended by providing logic to programmatically determine whether or not they must be `submit` controls, for example, by checking for specific properties. > [!NOTE] > 一个控件被视为可某个控件，仅当它实现方法来捕获回发事件。A control is considered to be a form-submit control only if it implements method to capture the postback event. 否则，它不为注册的默认事件处理程序，即使该方法返回`true`。Otherwise, it is not registered for the default event handler, even if the method returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通知服务器控件，它应关联，如设置数据库查询页执行普遍适用于每个 HTTP 请求的操作。This method notifies the server control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with, such as setting up a database query. 在此阶段，页生命周期中，创建和初始化层次结构中的服务器控件、 还原视图状态，和窗体控件反映客户端数据。At this stage in the page lifecycle, server controls in the hierarchy are created and initialized, view state is restored, and form controls reflect client-side data. 使用属性来确定是否以响应客户端回发，加载页时或如果正对其进行加载和访问第一次。Use the property to determine whether the page is being loaded in response to a client postback, or if it is being loaded and accessed for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你有格式的链接"# form1"用户控件中所包含的控件，此方法中查找的窗体`id=form1`在用户控件中。If you have a link of the format "#form1" in a control contained in a user control, this method looks for a form with `id=form1` in the user control. 如果未找到，它将在一任何的系列嵌套的用户控件，向上，则搜索页上的表单。If not found, it goes up the chain of any nested user controls, and then searches for the form on the page. > [!NOTE] > 作用域规则审核移、 不下移、 链。Scoping rules walk up, not down, the chain. 如果你想要浏览到包含用户控件中的窗体，则必须使用":"使用的语法方法来引用该窗体。If you want to browse to a form that is contained in a user control, you must use the ":" syntax used by method to refer to the form.

summary.span: 保存从持久性存储加载页面后出现的任何私有视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any private view-state changes that have occurred since the page was loaded from persistence.

summary.span: 如果未进行任何更改，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If no changes were made, this method returns .

returns.span: 包含已更改私有视图状态的对象。

span.span: An object containing the altered private view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以重写此方法以存储私有视图状态。You can override this method to store a private view state. 与普通视图状态保存的信息，除了 ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体存储信息，如窗体进行分页。In addition to information saved with the ordinary view state, ASP.NET mobile Web Forms store information such as whether or not the form is paginated. 将此添加的信息存储在私有视图状态，并存储在客户端，而不是服务器上。This added information is stored in the private view state and is stored on the client rather than the server. 私有视图状态保存在优化的方式。A private view state is saved in an optimized manner. 默认行为，例如进行第一种形式的活动的窗体，永远不会包含在已保存的私有视图状态。Default behavior, such as making the first form the active form, is never included in the saved private view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表包含的定义枚举。The following table contains the definitions of the enumeration. |枚举Enumerations|“值”Value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|00|没有大小设置为指定的对象。No size is set for the specified object. 这是默认值。This is the default value.| |`Wrap`|11|换到下一行。Wrap to the next line.| |`NoWrap`|22|在文本不换到下一行。The text is not wrapped to the next line.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用通过设置属性`FirstForm`属性基于浏览器的功能。The following example demonstrates how to use the property by setting the `FirstForm` property based on the capabilities of the browser. 此代码示例是一个更大的示例的一部分属性。This code sample is part of a larger example for the property.
